name: The Lost Hero
description:
Game made for the Global Game Jam 2021

Prelude

The year is 3099 and we are in the middle of a war against an Alien Invasion the African Continent is the last surviving enclave of humanity still standing. A Piece of Hardware exists that has the secret to defeating the Aliens and taking back our world. You have been tasked to find it. A Map divided into 2 pieces once assembled guides you to this lost hardware.

Assembling the Map

You need to find 2 keys that will unlock 2 chests. Each key and chest will be hidden at random places in the game.

Find the Map pieces assemble it and Find the Hardware and we could yet have a chance against the Aliens.

Dev Team

AAA Platforms Dev Team Consisting of:

  • Ahmed Maawy
  • Aly Salim
  • Issa Suleiman
  • Amir Abdulaziz

Credits

  • RFID Signal icon icon by Icons8

  • Font: Jackob Fischer
